title: The second part of the Cid
author: Desfontaines, Nicolas-Marc, d. 1652.
publisher: Printed by I. Okes, for Samuell Browne, and are to be sold at his shop in St. Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the white Lion,
notes: A translation of: Desfontaines, Nicolas-Marc.  La vraye suitte du Cid.
A sequel to: Corneille, Pierre.  Le Cid.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
